name: Paddle Master
description:
What is it about the retro wave we find so appealing?

It represents a clash of optimism and pessimism, a fascination with flying cars and laser weapons, tinged with a dark apprehension about what’s to come. That palpable impermanence is captured in retro wave; there’s a comforting minimalism among the neon-flickering lights, post-future mechanism and cyborg generation.

The 1980s being the rise of this paradigm, Paddle Master is a tribute to the 80s by the staging gameplay, neon-flickering lights and, the aesthetics with the appearance. It is a complete art form, accessible and understandable by all, blending of modern electronic composition with nostalgia makes for an irresistible combination.
